Question.Subject: Can someone convert a Firefox theme for me to work with 3.6 and up?
Question.Content: you can email me the files
Question.ChosenAnswer:
Here's more than 250 themes for FF 3.6: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/search?q=&appid=1&cat=2,0&tag=&atype=-1&pid=5&lup=&sort=&lver=3.6&pp=20
Next time, click Tools > Add-ons, click Browse All Add-ons, it will take you to 1000's of them
...

Answer.Content:
Here's more than 250 themes for FF 3.6: https://addons.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/search?q=&appid=1&cat=2,0&tag=&atype=-1&pid=5&lup=&sort=&lver=3.6&pp=20
Next time, click Tools > Add-ons, click Browse All Add-ons, it will take you to 1000's of them
